SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.swing
Annotation Type VisibleIf

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface VisibleIf

A binding that will set the Visible state of the annotated component to the state of a model boolean. The component must have a "setVisible" method that takes a boolean.

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String to
          The model boolean property to bind to.
 
Optional Element Summary
 VisibleIf.Type type
          Whether or not to invert the boolean.
 

Element Detail

to

public abstract java.lang.String to
The model boolean property to bind to.

type

public abstract VisibleIf.Type type
Whether or not to invert the boolean.

Default:
com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.swing.VisibleIf.Type.NORMAL
